questions.question: Which of the following are Azure Cognitive Services? (Select 2)
questions.explanation: Azure Cognitive Services include Language, Computer Vision, Speech, and Decision services. Azure Blob Storage is a storage service, Azure Virtual Network is a networking service, and Azure Kubernetes Service is a container orchestration service.
questions.feedback_correct: Correct! You've identified the Azure Cognitive Services correctly.
questions.feedback_incorrect: Not quite. Review the Azure Cognitive Services offerings.
